alert.note: Alert for Nacogdoches; Rusk; San Augustine; Shelby (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 16 at 11:09AM CDT until May 19 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following bayou in Texas... Attoyac Bayou Near Chireno affecting Rusk, San Augustine, Shelby and Nacogdoches Counties. For the Attoyac Bayou...including Chireno...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is going to slowly subside. * WHERE...Attoyac Bayou Near Chireno. * WHEN...Until Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Expect flooded paths and secondary roadways. Move livestock and equipment to higher ground. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM CDT Tuesday the stage was 16.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:30 AM CDT Tuesday was 16.8 feet. - Forecast...The river will continue to fall to below flood stage early Thursday afternoon and continue falling to 12.7 feet Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. For more hydrologic information, copy and paste the following website address into your favorite web browser URL bar: water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=shv The next statement will be issued Wednesday morning at 1115 AM CDT.
